Title: Relates to the limit upon real property tax levies by local governments
Summary: Relates to the limit upon real property tax levies by local governments; exempts real property owned by a city, town or village from taxes for infrastructure, road maintenance, snow removal, capital projects, consent order and smart growth initiative expenses and any extraordinary expenses required to respond to public health emergencies and pandemics.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the limit upon real property tax levies by local governments
